title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends Sean McDermott's decision to go for it on 4th down in a loss to the Titans and why being aggressive wins in pro sports. He discusses the short list of NFL QBs who he'd feel comfortable consistently going for it on 4th down in big spots. Colin also shares his Herd Hierarchy after week 6 of the NFL season. Plus, QB expert Jordan Palmer joins the show to talk about what makes Josh Allen special and which college quarterback could be the top pick in this year's draft. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
